mapper.insert:
SELECT game_no_seq.nextval as game_no FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO GAME_INFO (game_no, game_title, game_intro, game_difficulty, quiz_number, game_score, category_id, member_id) VALUES(#{gameNo}, #{gameTitle}, #{gameIntro}, #{gameDifficulty}, #{quizNumber}, #{gameScore}, #{categoryId}, #{memberId})

SELECT quiz_no_seq.nextval as quiz_no FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO QUIZ (quiz_no, question, answer, quiz_difficulty, hint, hint_point, game_no) VALUES(#{quizNo}, #{question}, #{answer}, #{quizDifficulty}, #{hint}, #{hintPoint}, #{gameNo})
mapper.select: SELECT g.game_no, g.game_title, g.game_intro, g.game_difficulty, g.quiz_number, g.game_score, g.category_id, g.member_id, COALESCE(h.score, 0) AS score FROM game_info g LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT history.score, history.game_no, history.member_id FROM history WHERE history.member_id = #{memberId}) h ON g.game_no = h.game_no ORDER BY g.game_no DESC

SELECT g.game_no, g.game_title, g.game_intro, g.game_difficulty, g.quiz_number, g.game_score, g.category_id, g.member_id, COALESCE(h.score, 0) AS score FROM game_info g LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT history.score, history.game_no, history.member_id FROM history WHERE history.member_id = #{memberId}) h ON g.game_no = h.game_no WHERE g.category_id = #{categoryId} ORDER BY g.game_no DESC

SELECT g.game_no AS gameNo, g.game_title AS gameTitle, g.game_intro AS gameIntro, g.game_difficulty AS gameDifficulty, g.quiz_number AS quizNumber, g.game_score AS gameScore, g.category_id AS categoryId, q.quiz_no AS quizNo, q.question, q.answer, q.quiz_difficulty AS quizDifficulty, q.hint, q.hint_point AS hintPoint, q.game_no AS gameNo FROM game_info g, quiz q WHERE g.game_no = q.game_no AND g.game_no=#{gameNo}
